titleStmt.title: A mouzell for Melastomus, the cynicall bayter of, and foule mouthed barker against Euahs sex. Or an apologeticall answere to that irreligious and illiterate pamphlet made by Io. Sw. and by him intituled, The arraignement of women. By Rachel Speght
titleStmt.author: Speght, Rachel.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes for Thomas Archer, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes-head-Pallace,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Swetnam, Joseph. The araignment of lewde, idle, froward, and unconstant women.
"Certaine quaeres to the bayter of women" has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.
